1.title: Just Another Day at the Shop
1.plot: In the pilot episode of Under My Skin, the A1 team introduces themselves and some of their crazy customers, Cracker provides some life advice to a regular, and introduces us to his daughters.

2.title: Don't Sweat It
2.plot: The team tries to get rid of a snake without burning down a tree, Chuck learns a valuable lesson from Cracker, and Ham may become a male stripper.

3.title: This Is So Hardcore: The Minisode
3.plot: The "This is Hardcore" minisode, featuring the A1 team prepping for and traveling to This is Hardcore Fest.

4.title: Who's Frank?
4.plot: A new apprentice joins the team at A1, but Cracker refuses to talk to him. Drew provides some insight, but new apprentice Frank is now avoiding Cracker at all costs.

imdb.plot outline: Based in South Jersey comes a series about A1 Tattoo, owned and operated by Cracker. The series follows the every day life of Cracker, a passionate artist, and his team, friends, family, and customers. Seeing the highs and lows about working in a tattoo shop delivers a funny, emotional, and dramatic look at the hard work put into running A1 Tattoo.
imdb.title: Under My Skin
plot: Based in South Jersey comes a series about A1 Tattoo, owned and operated by Cracker. The series follows the every day life of Cracker, a passionate artist, and his team, friends, family, and customers. Seeing the highs and lows about working in a tattoo shop delivers a funny, emotional, and dramatic look at the hard work put into running A1 Tattoo.::E. Burgan
